structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Tax district may levy one-time tax rate.
law.text: Notwithstanding the maximum tax rates in KRS 68.180, 68.197, and 91.200, a tax district which levies a tax on net profits may levy a tax rate that would generate approximately the same amount of revenues as the prior year plus normal revenue growth experienced by the tax district over the prior five (5) years. A tax district may invoke the provisions of this section only once.
law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 23, effective June 24, 2003.
